javacom

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacom.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    The Student class which will represent a student. Contains information about heating time, time to wait after a ready-check to erlang.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcus Enderskog

    • Constructor Detail

      • Student

        public Student(com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpErlangPid PID,
       int i)
        The Student constructor which sets the @see PID to an Erlang-pid . The waitingTime and heatingTime fields will be set with the static fields waitingTime respectively between the heatingTimeMin and heatingTimeMax in the Simulation class. The timer will also start its counting.
        Parameters:
        PID - An Erlang-pid which should correspond to a client_state-process in Erlang
        i -
        See Also:
        Simulation
